resources.string: This gesture is like a non-moving gesture. Usage of this gesture leads to malfunction. Try again!
How to operate with Gestures Service

If Gestures service is enabled, there is notification on the top of your screen. \nYou can switch Gestures service by clicking on banner "Gestures" on the top of the screen or by using Gestures widget which can be added to your Home screen. \nIn order to add widget go to your home screen, click menu → add → widgets and find Gestures widget there.
